title: Natchez National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       The National Park Service's Education Portal can be viewed by visiting www.nps.gov/learn Teachers, the William Johnson House and Melrose are open for field trips. If interested, please call (601)446-8601. If you would like a quicker response, please contact the group coordinator directly by e-mail. Note:  All reservations for groups must be made at least two weeks in advance. Groups that arrive 15 minutes or more past their scheduled reservation are not guaranteed a ranger-led program.  Â    You may also download our School Group Request Form, complete it and return it via fax or US Postal Service (fax number and address are included on form).
